      • getAccount

        public Account getAccount(java.lang.String accountType,
                          Customer customer,
                          double openingBalance)
        Method used to create accounts using a factory format. The request from the customer is passed as a string and it is evaluated and matched to the desired account constructor. The customer applying for the account is also passed through the params to provide information required to open the account.
        Parameters:
        accountType - String representation of the desired account type.
        customer - customer applying for the account
        openingBalance - opening balance of the account to be created
        Returns:
        returns the desired, newly constructed account if the customer qualified for the account, returns null otherwise
